metadata.name: Renamed Remote Utilities RAT (RURAT) Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of renamed Remote Utilities (RURAT) via Product PE header field

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('remote utilities') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rutserv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rfusclient.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of renamed Remote Utilities (RURAT) via Product PE header field
